showScoreExcerpt:
Foster is, as a performer, a little more eager and ingratiating than she is devil-may-care

Read more
nycTheatreExcerpt: She's good. I'd guess from her performance that she closely studied videos of Burnett in the role, and she has grasped that overdoing it is the key to this show. So she mugs and leans in and leans out and does a funny little loose waggle with her hips between lines.
